model.name: datasonnet
model.title: DataSonnet
model.description: To use DataSonnet scripts for message transformations.
model.label: language,transformation

id.description: Sets the id of this node

expression.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

bodyMediaType.description: The String representation of the message's body MediaType

outputMediaType.description: The String representation of the MediaType to output

source.description: Source to use, instead of message body. You can prefix with variable:, header:, or property: to specify kind of source. Otherwise, the source is assumed to be a variable. Use empty or null to use default source, which is the message body.

resultType.description: Sets the class of the result type (type from output)

trim.label: advanced
trim.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks
